Row.text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pop Art:[ENDCOLOR] 20% of [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism in Cities is converted into [ICON_GOLD] Gold. +5 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to Hotels, Stadiums, and Airports.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Commodities Exchange:[ENDCOLOR] Free Stock Exchange in all Cities. +100% quantity of Strategic and Luxury Resources from City-States. [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from gifted Luxuries increased by 50%.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Lobbyists:[ENDCOLOR] 5 :c5gold: Gold and 5 :c5culture: Culture per turn in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital for each Delegate you control in the World Congress. City State [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence decays 25% more slowly.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gospel of Wealth:[ENDCOLOR] Great Merchants grant 200 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence from Diplomatic Actions. :c5gold: Gold investments in Buildings reduce their Production cost by an additional 10%.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Insider Trading:[ENDCOLOR] +2 :trade: Trade Routes. Can establish :c5gold:Gold Internal :trade: Trade Routes. +5 :c5gold: Gold and :c5food: Food in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital for every Active :trade: Trade Route.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Too Big To Fail:[ENDCOLOR] +3 :c5gold: Gold to Banks, Stock Markets, Academies, Manufactories, Towns, Villages, and Unique Improvements. Academies, Towns, and Manufactories steal adjacent tiles when built.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Soft Power:[ENDCOLOR] +30 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence for Diplomatic Mission Actions. Unit Purchase Cooldowns are reduced by 1 turn.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Brand Ambassador:[ENDCOLOR] Gain +1 Spy. Diplomats in Foreign [ICON_CAPITAL] Capitals act as 2 Corporate Franchises. +3 :c5production: Production from Corporate Offices.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Tonnage War:[ENDCOLOR] Can build the [COLOR_YELLOW]Flower Class[ENDCOLOR]. +20 XP for all purchased units.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Panopticism:[ENDCOLOR] +10% :c5culture: Culture and :c5science: Science in all Cities. City :c5unhappy: Unhappiness does not affect City yields ( :c5unhappy: Unhappiness still reduces :c5goldenage: Golden Age Progress, triggers rebellion, and stops settler production).

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Indigo Era:[ENDCOLOR] Receive a Free Great Merchant and Great Scientist. +15% :c5science: Science during 'We Love the King Days'. 100 :c5gold: Gold when you discover a new Technology, Scaling with Era.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Corporate Personhood:[ENDCOLOR] +33% Yields to all :trade: Trade Routes. Yields from Processes in all Cities are increased by 10%.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Company Towns:[ENDCOLOR] +100% :c5production: Production towards Settler units. Settler Units claim all Resource tiles within 3 tiles, and Start with a free Factory.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Evergreen Patents:[ENDCOLOR] Free Medical Lab in your :c5capital: Capital. +100% :c5production: Production towards Medical Labs on Empire. Research Labs and Medical Labs gain 5 :c5science: Science and 5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Campaign Contributions:[ENDCOLOR] Can purchase Votes for the World Congress with :c5gold: Gold.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Horizontal Integration:[ENDCOLOR] All Improved Luxury Resource tiles Provide 1 additional Resource copy. 20 :c5gold: Gold and :c5science: Science in the :c5capital: Capital for each Global Monopoly.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Private Spaceflight:[ENDCOLOR] No limit to the number of Corporate Franchises on Empire. +2% :c5production: Production Towards Spaceship Parts in your :c5capital: Capital for every Corporate Franchise you control.
